Author: pileofposey
Text: try to take a nap. sleep is good and i always feel less "full" after a nap, which reduces my anxiety around the food i consumed

Author: kladarling
Text: just breath through it, and try to distract yourself with something, anything you can think of until the feeling passes. Maybe, if you can, try painting your nails. It takes a good amount of focus and you won't be able to use your hand for a while until they dry.
